title: Kevin Smith | Amy Poehler and Seth React to Cuomo’s Resignation
description:
Amy Poehler joins Seth to discuss Andrew Cuomo’s resignation from governor of New York and other headlines.

Then, Kevin Smith gushes about Seth’s special Lobby Baby, tells the story of his visit to the periodontist and teases his upcoming film Clerks 3.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
